name: GeoEdge
tag_list: geo-location, proxy-network, publishers, ad-networks, advertisers, media-buyers, mobile, mobile-emulator, business-intelligence, ad-analytics, geo-targeted-content, display-ads
overview:
Geoedge - View, monitor and analyze web content and ads from more than 110 locations around the world.

GeoEdge was founded in 2009 by a team with more than two decades of hands-on technical and online media experience. Through continuous innovation and dedication to customer satisfaction, GeoEdge has risen to a position of leadership in the geo-location market.

Our comprehensive solutions provide publishers, advertisers, advertising networks and SEO/SEM professionals the ability to view Web content, exactly as it appears in any location around the world. Thousands of users already leverage our business intelligence platform to perfect the media buying process, gain insight about the competition, streamline global operations and ensure compliance.

From our advanced Business Intelligence engine, to our proprietary proxy servers in more than 90 countries and 35 US DMAs, Canadian, UK and German cities, we are committed to pushing the limits and understanding of what is really possible.

Trusted by some of the largest Internet companies in world and thousands of online professionals, GeoEdge’s user-friendly toolbars, secure VPN client and comprehensive Ad Analytics platform were designed to overcome the challenges of publishers, media buyers, advertising networks and online advertising professional people whose businesses rely on accurate perspectives of international web marketing.
